requirement_tested: A responsive frontend interface with a seashell background color and crimson-themed components
user_persona: A medical student browsing the website on different devices.
user_goal: To comfortably read medical articles regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the website on a desktop computer to explore medical content.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads with seashell background and crimson-themed interactive elements like buttons and links.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: Alex resizes the window to simulate mobile viewing.
narrative_steps.action: Manually resize browser window width from large to small.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts smoothly maintaining readability and usability across breakpoints.

requirement_tested: A search functionality allowing users to find medical articles by keywords
user_persona: A doctor looking for specific research on heart conditions.
user_goal: To quickly locate relevant medical articles using keyword search.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee sees the prominent search bar and types in 'heart disease'.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'heart disease' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Input reflects typed text; optional suggestions may appear below the input.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Dr. Lee presses Enter to initiate the search.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter key or click the submit/search icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System makes API call to /api/articles/search?q=heart%20disease and displays filtered results.

requirement_tested: Ability to view individual medical articles with full content display
user_persona: A nurse wanting to read more about a newly published article.
user_goal: To access and thoroughly read the contents of an article.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Article
narrative_steps.description: Nina clicks on an article titled 'Latest Advances in Diabetes Treatment' from the results list.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the article link/card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigates to article detail page at route matching its unique slug.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Full Content
narrative_steps.description: Nina begins reading the full content displayed clearly on the article page.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through article content area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article title, abstract, author name, publication date, and full body content render cleanly with proper spacing and formatting.

requirement_tested: Option to download medical articles as PDF files
user_persona: A researcher who prefers offline reading material.
user_goal: To save a copy of an article for later offline reference.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Article
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Patel opens an article on 'Neurological Disorders in Children' to evaluate its relevance.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the article page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article content loads fully including metadata and main body.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading PDF
narrative_steps.description: Finding the article useful, Dr. Patel decides to download it as a PDF.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download PDF' button located beneath the article content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Browser initiates a GET request to /api/articles/{id}/download and prompts file download dialog with generated PDF.

requirement_tested: User authentication system supporting login and registration
user_persona: A new contributor joining the platform.
user_goal: To create an account and gain access to the author dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Registering New Account
narrative_steps.description: Sam visits the site and chooses to register as a new user.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out registration form with name, email, password, and confirm password then click Register.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System calls /api/auth/register, creates account, logs Sam in automatically, and redirects to dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In Again
narrative_steps.description: Later, Sam returns and logs in using previously created credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Enter registered email and password into login form and click Login.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System authenticates via /api/auth/login, issues JWT token, stores it, and grants access to dashboard.

user_persona: An existing author returning to check her contributions.
user_goal: To access her personalized dashboard after logging in.

narrative_steps.title: Successful Login
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Kim enters correct login details and submits them.
narrative_steps.action: Submit valid email and password via login form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication succeeds, JWT token is issued and stored, redirect occurs to /dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Kim lands on her dashboard which displays her profile and submitted articles.
narrative_steps.action: Visit /dashboard directly or get redirected post-login.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard renders showing sidebar navigation, profile summary card, and list of authored articles.

requirement_tested: Profile editing capability for authors to update personal information
user_persona: An author needing to update professional details.
user_goal: To modify and save updated profile information.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: Author Alex wants to update his specialty and bio.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to Edit Profile section and change values in name, specialty, and bio fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Editable fields allow modification and reflect new inputs immediately.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Details
narrative_steps.description: Alex confirms changes by clicking Save.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Save Changes button after entering updated data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form sends PUT request to /api/profile/update, saves new info, and refreshes UI with updated profile data.

requirement_tested: Backend API to serve medical article data dynamically
user_goal: To confirm that API returns accurate article data.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Articles List
narrative_steps.description: Developer hits the articles listing endpoint to verify connectivity and data shape.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/articles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns JSON array containing article objects retrieved from PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Retrieving Single Article
narrative_steps.description: Developer requests a specific article by ID.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/articles/{valid-uuid}
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Responds with complete article data matching record in articles table.

requirement_tested: Frontend fetching all medical content exclusively via backend APIs
user_persona: End-user visiting article pages without seeing any mock data.
user_goal: To view live-updated medical content sourced only from backend.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Article Listing
narrative_steps.description: User navigates to homepage expecting real-time article feeds.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage which lists latest articles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content loads dynamically via Axios/Fetch calling /api/articles instead of using static data.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Individual Article
narrative_steps.description: User selects one article to read full details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on article link leading to individual article view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article content fetched solely from backend endpoint /api/articles/{id} and rendered appropriately.

requirement_tested: Backend connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_goal: To ensure backend successfully connects to PostgreSQL with predefined settings.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Engineer sets up deployment environment with exact DB config.
narrative_steps.action: Configure environment variables DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application reads these vars correctly during startup sequence.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Server boots up attempting to establish DB connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start Node.js/Express backend service.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully establishes PostgreSQL connection string postgresql://myappuser:myapppassword@localhost:5432/myapp.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting storage and retrieval of medical articles
user_goal: To validate correctness and efficiency of article-related database structures.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Table Definition
narrative_steps.description: Admin examines SQL schema defining how articles are stored.
narrative_steps.action: Review CREATE TABLE articles(...) definition.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Schema matches specification: UUID PK, title, abstract, content, foreign-key author_id, timestamp.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Data Retrieval
narrative_steps.description: Admin performs sample queries against the articles table.
narrative_steps.action: Execute SELECT * FROM articles LIMIT 5;
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns rows conforming to defined schema structure with no constraint violations.

requirement_tested: Database user management for author accounts and profiles
user_persona: Security analyst auditing user handling procedures.
user_goal: To ensure robust and secure handling of user identity data.

narrative_steps.title: Checking User Schema
narrative_steps.description: Analyst reviews the database schema for user records.
narrative_steps.action: Examine CREATE TABLE users(...) statement.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table has required columns: id(UUID), name, email(UNIQUE), password_hash, bio, specialty.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Password Storage
narrative_steps.description: Ensures sensitive data like passwords aren't stored in plain text.
narrative_steps.action: Query example row from users table observing password field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Password field shows hashed value, not raw input from registration.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `install:all` script to set up both frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: New team member setting up project locally.
user_goal: To easily install all necessary packages for both client and server sides.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Developer clones repo and runs unified dependency installer.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend/ and backend/ directories run npm install concurrently without error.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `dev` script to run frontend and backend concurrently
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend services seamlessly.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Dev Servers
narrative_steps.description: Developer starts development servers with single command.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root folder.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Concurrently executes frontend (e.g., React dev server) and backend (Node.js Express app).

requirement_tested: SEO-friendly URL structure for medical articles
user_goal: To share readable and indexed URLs pointing to specific articles.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Article
narrative_steps.description: Publisher adds a new article titled 'Understanding Heart Disease'.
narrative_steps.action: Submit article creation form via dashboard UI or API.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article gets inserted into DB with auto-generated slug 'understanding-heart-disease'.

narrative_steps.title: Sharing Article Link
narrative_steps.description: Publisher shares the public link to colleagues and social media.
narrative_steps.action: Copy/paste article URL from browser address bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: URL follows pattern http://site.com/articles/understanding-heart-disease and resolves properly.
